name: Cursed Fates: The Headless Horseman - Collector's Edition
name_original: Cursed Fates: The Headless Horseman - Collector's Edition
description:
Cursed Fates: The Headless Horseman - Collector's Edition is an adventure game developed by Fenomen Games. It came out on 28-06-2012. It was published by Nevosoft.
Cursed Fates: The Headless Horseman - Collector's Edition is available on PC and Classic Macintosh.
